text: @piersmorgan The UK put profit before people.On Sat.Apr.18, 115,300 CASES in UK and 15,497 DEATHS for a mortality rate of 13.44% which is HIGH, if compared to Germany's MR of 3.09% or the seasonal flu which is has a MR of 0.1%. BE SAFE: isolate, distance, wash hands & wear masks. #coronavirus
